lessons.name: One Or More
lessons.outcome:
Create plurals 
a. Identify nouns that form their
plurals by adding “s”
b. Identify nouns that form their
plurals by adding ‘es” e.g.
nouns ending in “x” “ch” and
“sh”
c. Use of singular and plural
nouns in simple sentences
using this, that, these or
those.
